column1: * [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Peregrin Took]] depart [[the Shire]] and travel into the south.<ref name="Later">{{App
* [[Faramir Took I]] succeeds his father Peregrin Took as [[Thain]] of [[the Shire]].<ref name="Later"/>

column2: King]] [[Éomer]].<ref name="Later"/><ref name="note" group="note">This takes place in year Fourth Age 64 by the reckoning of Gondor.</ref>

column1: * [[Elfwine]], son of Éomer, becomes the nineteenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Later"/><ref name="note" group="note"/>
* Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took then travel on to [[Gondor]].<ref name="Later"/> Peregrin brings a copy of the [[Thain's Book]] with him.<ref>{{FR
